Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~LeoKotschenreuther its working as ... expected. Auto address detect picks the first non-loopback, IPv4 address in the system. It'll certainly not work for Chaincode when TLS enabled (except for the narrow case of matching the address in the cert).

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~LeoKotschenreuther let me close this as Done. Do reopen if you need clarification please.
